page.title: 06CHURCHES.
page.content: Mr.L.De Groose is the{Rector}of GT Oakley he is also the{Vicar}of Wix. The{church}is open every day for people to come in and to pray to God. Mr.P.Palmer and Mrs.S.Wild are the {Church Wardens.}The services are: {Sunday Holy Communion}at 09:30,{Even {song}is on Sunday evening. Once a month we have a{Family Service}at 10:00 in the morning. The Church has also been used for concerts. The church is about 900 years old. We are very worried because the walls are damp. Great Oakley{Methodist Church}is part of Manningtree and Harwich methodist Church circuit of 15 chapels.The minister is{Rev.H.Gordon Lemmon}.There is a service at 10.45 on Sundays and a Sacrament Service once a month.There is a membership of 20 adults and a Sunday school of 8 children.
